<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[blockly](./blockly.md)

## blockly package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ASTNode](./blockly.astnode_class.md) | Class for an AST node. It is recommended that you use one of the createNode methods instead of creating a node directly. |
|  [BasicCursor](./blockly.basiccursor_class.md) | Class for a basic cursor. This will allow the user to get to all nodes in the AST by hitting next or previous. |
|  [Block](./blockly.block_class.md) | Class for one block. Not normally called directly, workspace.newBlock() is preferred. |
|  [BlockDragger](./blockly.blockdragger_class.md) | Class for a block dragger. It moves blocks around the workspace when they are being dragged by a mouse or touch. |
|  [BlockDragSurfaceSvg](./blockly.blockdragsurfacesvg_class.md) | Class for a drag surface for the currently dragged block. This is a separate SVG that contains only the currently moving block, or nothing. |
|  [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg_class.md) | Class for a block's SVG representation. Not normally called directly, workspace.newBlock() is preferred. |
|  [Bubble](./blockly.bubble_class.md) | Class for UI bubble. |
|  [BubbleDragger](./blockly.bubbledragger_class.md) | Class for a bubble dragger. It moves things on the bubble canvas around the workspace when they are being dragged by a mouse or touch. These can be block comments, mutators, warnings, or workspace comments. |
|  [CodeGenerator](./blockly.codegenerator_class.md) | Class for a code generator that translates the blocks into a language. |
|  [CollapsibleToolboxCategory](./blockly.collapsibletoolboxcategory_class.md) | Class for a category in a toolbox that can be collapsed. |
|  [Comment](./blockly.comment_class.md) | Class for a comment. |
|  [ComponentManager](./blockly.componentmanager_class.md) | Manager for all items registered with the workspace. |
|  [Connection](./blockly.connection_class.md) | Class for a connection between blocks. |
|  [ConnectionChecker](./blockly.connectionchecker_class.md) | Class for connection type checking logic. |
|  [ConnectionDB](./blockly.connectiondb_class.md) | Database of connections. Connections are stored in order of their vertical component. This way connections in an area may be looked up quickly using a binary search. |
|  [ContextMenuRegistry](./blockly.contextmenuregistry_class.md) | Class for the registry of context menu items. This is intended to be a singleton. You should not create a new instance, and only access this class from ContextMenuRegistry.registry. |
|  [Cursor](./blockly.cursor_class.md) | Class for a cursor. A cursor controls how a user navigates the Blockly AST. |
|  [DeleteArea](./blockly.deletearea_class.md) | Abstract class for a component that can delete a block or bubble that is dropped on top of it. |
|  [DragTarget](./blockly.dragtarget_class.md) | Abstract class for a component with custom behaviour when a block or bubble is dragged over or dropped on top of it. |
|  [Field](./blockly.field_class.md) | Abstract class for an editable field. |
|  [FieldAngle](./blockly.fieldangle_class.md) | Class for an editable angle field. |
|  [FieldCheckbox](./blockly.fieldcheckbox_class.md) | Class for a checkbox field. |
|  [FieldColour](./blockly.fieldcolour_class.md) | Class for a colour input field. |
|  [FieldDropdown](./blockly.fielddropdown_class.md) | Class for an editable dropdown field. |
|  [FieldImage](./blockly.fieldimage_class.md) | Class for an image on a block. |
|  [FieldLabel](./blockly.fieldlabel_class.md) | Class for a non-editable, non-serializable text field. |
|  [FieldLabelSerializable](./blockly.fieldlabelserializable_class.md) | Class for a non-editable, serializable text field. |
|  [FieldMultilineInput](./blockly.fieldmultilineinput_class.md) | Class for an editable text area field. |
|  [FieldNumber](./blockly.fieldnumber_class.md) | Class for an editable number field. |
|  [FieldTextInput](./blockly.fieldtextinput_class.md) |  |
|  [FieldVariable](./blockly.fieldvariable_class.md) | Class for a variable's dropdown field. |
|  [Flyout](./blockly.flyout_class.md) | Class for a flyout. |
|  [FlyoutButton](./blockly.flyoutbutton_class.md) | Class for a button or label in the flyout. |
|  [FlyoutMetricsManager](./blockly.flyoutmetricsmanager_class.md) | Calculates metrics for a flyout's workspace. The metrics are mainly used to size scrollbars for the flyout. |
|  [Gesture](./blockly.gesture_class.md) | Class for one gesture. |
|  [Grid](./blockly.grid_class.md) | Class for a workspace's grid. |
|  [HorizontalFlyout](./blockly.horizontalflyout_class.md) | Class for a flyout. |
|  [Icon](./blockly.icon_class.md) | Class for an icon. |
|  [Input](./blockly.input_class.md) | Class for an input with an optional field. |
|  [InsertionMarkerManager](./blockly.insertionmarkermanager_class.md) | Class that controls updates to connections during drags. It is primarily responsible for finding the closest eligible connection and highlighting or unhighlighting it as needed during a drag. |
|  [Marker](./blockly.marker_class.md) | Class for a marker. This is used in keyboard navigation to save a location in the Blockly AST. |
|  [MarkerManager](./blockly.markermanager_class.md) | Class to manage the multiple markers and the cursor on a workspace. |
|  [Menu](./blockly.menu_class.md) | A basic menu class. |
|  [MenuItem](./blockly.menuitem_class.md) | Class representing an item in a menu. |
|  [MetricsManager](./blockly.metricsmanager_class.md) | The manager for all workspace metrics calculations. |
|  [Mutator](./blockly.mutator_class.md) | Class for a mutator dialog. |
|  [Names](./blockly.names_class.md) | Class for a database of entity names (variables, procedures, etc). |
|  [Options](./blockly.options_class.md) | Parse the user-specified options, using reasonable defaults where behaviour is unspecified. |
|  [RenderedConnection](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.md) | Class for a connection between blocks that may be rendered on screen. |
|  [Scrollbar](./blockly.scrollbar_class.md) | Class for a pure SVG scrollbar. This technique offers a scrollbar that is guaranteed to work, but may not look or behave like the system's scrollbars. |
|  [ScrollbarPair](./blockly.scrollbarpair_class.md) | Class for a pair of scrollbars. Horizontal and vertical. |
|  [ShortcutRegistry](./blockly.shortcutregistry_class.md) | Class for the registry of keyboard shortcuts. This is intended to be a singleton. You should not create a new instance, and only access this class from ShortcutRegistry.registry. |
|  [TabNavigateCursor](./blockly.tabnavigatecursor_class.md) | A cursor for navigating between tab navigable fields. |
|  [Theme](./blockly.theme_class.md) | Class for a theme. |
|  [ThemeManager](./blockly.thememanager_class.md) | Class for storing and updating a workspace's theme and UI components. |
|  [Toolbox](./blockly.toolbox_class.md) | Class for a Toolbox. Creates the toolbox's DOM. |
|  [ToolboxCategory](./blockly.toolboxcategory_class.md) | Class for a category in a toolbox. |
|  [ToolboxItem](./blockly.toolboxitem_class.md) | Class for an item in the toolbox. |
|  [ToolboxSeparator](./blockly.toolboxseparator_class.md) | Class for a toolbox separator. This is the thin visual line that appears on the toolbox. This item is not interactable. |
|  [Trashcan](./blockly.trashcan_class.md) | Class for a trash can. |
|  [VariableMap](./blockly.variablemap_class.md) | Class for a variable map. This contains a dictionary data structure with variable types as keys and lists of variables as values. The list of variables are the type indicated by the key. |
|  [VariableModel](./blockly.variablemodel_class.md) | Class for a variable model. Holds information for the variable including name, ID, and type. |
|  [VerticalFlyout](./blockly.verticalflyout_class.md) | Class for a flyout. |
|  [Warning](./blockly.warning_class.md) | Class for a warning. |
|  [Workspace](./blockly.workspace_class.md) | Class for a workspace. This is a data structure that contains blocks. There is no UI, and can be created headlessly. |
|  [WorkspaceAudio](./blockly.workspaceaudio_class.md) | Class for loading, storing, and playing audio for a workspace. |
|  [WorkspaceComment](./blockly.workspacecomment_class.md) | Class for a workspace comment. |
|  [WorkspaceCommentSvg](./blockly.workspacecommentsvg_class.md) | Class for a workspace comment's SVG representation. |
|  [WorkspaceDragger](./blockly.workspacedragger_class.md) | Class for a workspace dragger. It moves the workspace around when it is being dragged by a mouse or touch. Note that the workspace itself manages whether or not it has a drag surface and how to do translations based on that. This simply passes the right commands based on events. |
|  [WorkspaceDragSurfaceSvg](./blockly.workspacedragsurfacesvg_class.md) | Blocks are moved into this SVG during a drag, improving performance. The entire SVG is translated using CSS transforms instead of SVG so the blocks are never repainted during drag improving performance. |
|  [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) | Class for a workspace. This is an onscreen area with optional trashcan, scrollbars, bubbles, and dragging. |
|  [ZoomControls](./blockly.zoomcontrols_class.md) | Class for a zoom controls. |

## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ConnectionType](./blockly.connectiontype_enum.md) | Enum for the type of a connection or input. |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [bindEvent\_(node, name, thisObject, func)](./blockly.bindevent__1_function.md) | Bind an event handler that should be called regardless of whether it is part of the active touch stream. Use this for events that are not part of a multi-part gesture (e.g. mouseover for tooltips). |
|  [bindEventWithChecks\_(node, name, thisObject, func, opt\_noCaptureIdentifier, \_opt\_noPreventDefault)](./blockly.bindeventwithchecks__1_function.md) | Bind an event handler that can be ignored if it is not part of the active touch stream. Use this for events that either start or continue a multi-part gesture (e.g. mousedown or mousemove, which may be part of a drag or click). |
|  [copy(toCopy)](./blockly.copy_1_function.md) | Copy a block or workspace comment onto the local clipboard. |
|  [duplicate(toDuplicate)](./blockly.duplicate_1_function.md) | Duplicate this block and its children, or a workspace comment. |
|  [hideChaff(opt\_onlyClosePopups)](./blockly.hidechaff_1_function.md) | Close tooltips, context menus, dropdown selections, etc. |
|  [hueToHex(hue)](./blockly.huetohex_1_function.md) | Convert a hue (HSV model) into an RGB hex triplet. |
|  [inject(container, opt\_options)](./blockly.inject_1_function.md) | Inject a Blockly editor into the specified container element (usually a div). |
|  [isNumber(str)](./blockly.isnumber_1_function.md) | Is the given string a number (includes negative and decimals). |
|  [paste()](./blockly.paste_1_function.md) | Paste a block or workspace comment on to the main workspace. |
|  [unbindEvent\_(bindData)](./blockly.unbindevent__1_function.md) | Unbind one or more events event from a function call. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BlocklyOptions](./blockly.blocklyoptions_interface.md) | Blockly options. |
|  [IASTNodeLocation](./blockly.iastnodelocation_interface.md) | An AST node location interface. |
|  [IASTNodeLocationSvg](./blockly.iastnodelocationsvg_interface.md) | An AST node location SVG interface. |
|  [IASTNodeLocationWithBlock](./blockly.iastnodelocationwithblock_interface.md) | An AST node location that has an associated block. |
|  [IAutoHideable](./blockly.iautohideable_interface.md) | Interface for a component that can be automatically hidden. |
|  [IBlockDragger](./blockly.iblockdragger_interface.md) | A block dragger interface. |
|  [IBoundedElement](./blockly.iboundedelement_interface.md) | A bounded element interface. |
|  [IBubble](./blockly.ibubble_interface.md) | A bubble interface. |
|  [ICollapsibleToolboxItem](./blockly.icollapsibletoolboxitem_interface.md) | Interface for an item in the toolbox that can be collapsed. |
|  [IComponent](./blockly.icomponent_interface.md) | The interface for a workspace component that can be registered with the ComponentManager. |
|  [IConnectionChecker](./blockly.iconnectionchecker_interface.md) | Class for connection type checking logic. |
|  [IContextMenu](./blockly.icontextmenu_interface.md) |  |
|  [ICopyable](./blockly.icopyable_interface.md) |  |
|  [IDeletable](./blockly.ideletable_interface.md) | The interface for an object that can be deleted. |
|  [IDeleteArea](./blockly.ideletearea_interface.md) | Interface for a component that can delete a block or bubble that is dropped on top of it. |
|  [IDraggable](./blockly.idraggable_interface.md) | The interface for an object that can be dragged. |
|  [IDragTarget](./blockly.idragtarget_interface.md) | Interface for a component with custom behaviour when a block or bubble is dragged over or dropped on top of it. |
|  [IFlyout](./blockly.iflyout_interface.md) | Interface for a flyout. |
|  [IKeyboardAccessible](./blockly.ikeyboardaccessible_interface.md) | An interface for an object that handles keyboard shortcuts. |
|  [IMetricsManager](./blockly.imetricsmanager_interface.md) | Interface for a metrics manager. |
|  [IMovable](./blockly.imovable_interface.md) | The interface for an object that is movable. |
|  [IPositionable](./blockly.ipositionable_interface.md) | Interface for a component that is positioned on top of the workspace. |
|  [IRegistrable](./blockly.iregistrable_interface.md) | The interface for a Blockly component that can be registered. |
|  [ISelectable](./blockly.iselectable_interface.md) | The interface for an object that is selectable. |
|  [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem_interface.md) | Interface for an item in the toolbox that can be selected. |
|  [IStyleable](./blockly.istyleable_interface.md) | Interface for an object that a style can be added to. |
|  [IToolbox](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.md) | Interface for a toolbox. |
|  [IToolboxItem](./blockly.itoolboxitem_interface.md) | Interface for an item in the toolbox. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ALIGN\_CENTRE](./blockly.align_centre_variable.md) |  |
|  [ALIGN\_LEFT](./blockly.align_left_variable.md) |  |
|  [ALIGN\_RIGHT](./blockly.align_right_variable.md) |  |
|  [Blocks](./blockly.blocks_variable.md) | A mapping of block type names to block prototype objects. |
|  [COLLAPSE\_CHARS](./blockly.collapse_chars_variable.md) |  |
|  [COLLAPSED\_FIELD\_NAME](./blockly.collapsed_field_name_variable.md) |  |
|  [COLLAPSED\_INPUT\_NAME](./blockly.collapsed_input_name_variable.md) |  |
|  [config](./blockly.config_variable.md) | Object holding all the values on Blockly that we expect developers to be able to change. |
|  [connectionTypes](./blockly.connectiontypes_variable.md) |  |
|  [defineBlocksWithJsonArray](./blockly.defineblockswithjsonarray_variable.md) | Define blocks from an array of JSON block definitions, as might be generated by the Blockly Developer Tools. |
|  [DELETE\_VARIABLE\_ID](./blockly.delete_variable_id_variable.md) |  |
|  [DRAG\_STACK](./blockly.drag_stack_variable.md) |  |
|  [DropDownDiv](./blockly.dropdowndiv_variable.md) |  |
|  [DUMMY\_INPUT](./blockly.dummy_input_variable.md) |  |
|  [getMainWorkspace](./blockly.getmainworkspace_variable.md) | Returns the main workspace. Returns the last used main workspace (based on focus). Try not to use this function, particularly if there are multiple Blockly instances on a page. |
|  [getSelected](./blockly.getselected_variable.md) | Returns the currently selected copyable object. |
|  [INPUT\_VALUE](./blockly.input_value_variable.md) |  |
|  [JavaScript](./blockly.javascript_variable.md) |  |
|  [Msg](./blockly.msg_variable.md) | A dictionary of localised messages. |
|  [NEXT\_STATEMENT](./blockly.next_statement_variable.md) |  |
|  [OPPOSITE\_TYPE](./blockly.opposite_type_variable.md) |  |
|  [OUTPUT\_VALUE](./blockly.output_value_variable.md) |  |
|  [PREVIOUS\_STATEMENT](./blockly.previous_statement_variable.md) |  |
|  [PROCEDURE\_CATEGORY\_NAME](./blockly.procedure_category_name_variable.md) | String for use in the "custom" attribute of a category in toolbox XML. This string indicates that the category should be dynamically populated with procedure blocks. |
|  [RENAME\_VARIABLE\_ID](./blockly.rename_variable_id_variable.md) |  |
|  [resizeSvgContents](./blockly.resizesvgcontents_variable.md) |  |
|  [setLocale](./blockly.setlocale_variable.md) | <p>Sets the locale (i.e. the localized messages/block-text/etc) to the given locale.</p><p>This is not useful/necessary when loading from a script tag, because the messages are automatically cluged into the Blockly.Msg object. But we provide it in both the script-tag and non-script-tag contexts so that the tscompiler can properly create our type definition files.</p> |
|  [setParentContainer](./blockly.setparentcontainer_variable.md) | Set the parent container. This is the container element that the WidgetDiv, dropDownDiv, and Tooltip are rendered into the first time <code>Blockly.inject</code> is called. This method is a NOP if called after the first <code>Blockly.inject</code>. |
|  [svgResize](./blockly.svgresize_variable.md) | Size the SVG image to completely fill its container. Call this when the view actually changes sizes (e.g. on a window resize/device orientation change). See workspace.resizeContents to resize the workspace when the contents change (e.g. when a block is added or removed). Record the height/width of the SVG image. |
|  [TOOLBOX\_AT\_BOTTOM](./blockly.toolbox_at_bottom_variable.md) |  |
|  [TOOLBOX\_AT\_LEFT](./blockly.toolbox_at_left_variable.md) |  |
|  [TOOLBOX\_AT\_RIGHT](./blockly.toolbox_at_right_variable.md) |  |
|  [TOOLBOX\_AT\_TOP](./blockly.toolbox_at_top_variable.md) |  |
|  [VARIABLE\_CATEGORY\_NAME](./blockly.variable_category_name_variable.md) | String for use in the "custom" attribute of a category in toolbox XML. This string indicates that the category should be dynamically populated with variable blocks. |
|  [VARIABLE\_DYNAMIC\_CATEGORY\_NAME](./blockly.variable_dynamic_category_name_variable.md) | String for use in the "custom" attribute of a category in toolbox XML. This string indicates that the category should be dynamically populated with variable blocks. |
|  [VERSION](./blockly.version_variable.md) | Blockly core version. This constant is overridden by the build script (npm run build) to the value of the version in package.json. This is done by the Closure Compiler in the buildCompressed gulp task. For local builds, you can pass --define='Blockly.VERSION=X.Y.Z' to the compiler to override this constant. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [FieldAngleValidator](./blockly.fieldanglevalidator_typealias.md) |  |
|  [FieldCheckboxValidator](./blockly.fieldcheckboxvalidator_typealias.md) |  |
|  [FieldColourValidator](./blockly.fieldcolourvalidator_typealias.md) |  |
|  [FieldDropdownValidator](./blockly.fielddropdownvalidator_typealias.md) |  |
|  [FieldMultilineInputValidator](./blockly.fieldmultilineinputvalidator_typealias.md) |  |
|  [FieldNumberValidator](./blockly.fieldnumbervalidator_typealias.md) |  |
|  [FieldTextInputValidator](./blockly.fieldtextinputvalidator_typealias.md) |  |
|  [FieldValidator](./blockly.fieldvalidator_typealias.md) |  |
|  [FieldVariableValidator](./blockly.fieldvariablevalidator_typealias.md) |  |
|  [MenuGenerator](./blockly.menugenerator_typealias.md) | Either an array of menu options or a function that generates an array of menu options for FieldDropdown or its descendants. |
|  [MenuGeneratorFunction](./blockly.menugeneratorfunction_typealias.md) | A function that generates an array of menu options for FieldDropdown or its descendants. |
|  [MenuOption](./blockly.menuoption_typealias.md) | An individual option in the dropdown menu. The first element is the human- readable value (text or image), and the second element is the language- neutral value. |
